values: This journal is friends only - my main journal is . I'll be posting my NaNoWriMo novel here as it's written, but it will be only first draft. If you want to read it anyway, comment and / or friend and I'll friend your journal so you can see it. ETA: Journal entries are now private until the finished and betaed fic is up. Aiming for September 1st 2005 so that I can say it took less than a year *g*
